secondaries.shortDescription: 4 points at the end of the round if 1+ enemy units destroyed and no ADEPTOS CUSTODS or ANTHEMA PSYKNA were destroyed during that battle round

subObjectives.description: 1+ enemy units killed, but no ADEPTOS CUSTODS nor ANTHEMA PSYKNA

secondaries.shortDescription: Target an opponent's PRIMARCH or SUP. COMMANDER (If none, highest point). Win points depending on how you destroyed it (up to 15pts), -2pts for each unit that targeted enemy has destroyed

subObjectives.description: The targeted unit has been destroyed
The targeted unit has been destroyed in melee bt ADEPTOS CUSTODS or ANTHEMA PSYKNA unit from your army
Previous 2 conditions are true AND the targeted unit dies more than 6" away from your deployment zone
The targeted unit destroyed a unit in your army (Can repeat)
The targeted unit destroyed a unit in your army (Can repeat)
The targeted unit destroyed 2 units in your army (Can repeat)
The targeted unit destroyed 2 units in your army (Can repeat)

secondaries.shortDescription: 3 points at the end of the battle round if you control more objective not within either player's deployment zone than your opponent

subObjectives.description: You control more objectives NOT in deployment zones of players than your opponent
